sqlMap.select: select OTHER_QUESTIONS_ID, BORROWER_SERVICE_APP_ID, GUARANTEE, GUARANTEE_DETAILS, HOW_LONG, GAMBLING, GAMBLING_SPOUSE, HELP, HELP_DETAILS, BORROW_AMOUNT, GUARANTEE_AMOUNT, ENOUGH_DEPOSITS, HOW_ENOUGH, SPOUSE_INFORMED, SPOUSE_EXPLANATION from RL_OTHER_QUESTIONS where OTHER_QUESTIONS_ID = #otherQuestionsId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_BASIC_INFO.NEXTVAL as value from dual
insert into RL_OTHER_QUESTIONS (OTHER_QUESTIONS_ID, BORROWER_SERVICE_APP_ID, GUARANTEE, GUARANTEE_DETAILS, HOW_LONG, GAMBLING, GAMBLING_SPOUSE, HELP, HELP_DETAILS, BORROW_AMOUNT, GUARANTEE_AMOUNT, ENOUGH_DEPOSITS, HOW_ENOUGH, SPOUSE_INFORMED, SPOUSE_EXPLANATION) values (#otherQuestionsId:DECIMAL#, #borrowerServiceAppId:DECIMAL#, #guarantee:CHAR#, #guaranteeDetails:VARCHAR#, #howLong:CHAR#, #gambling:CHAR#, #gamblingSpouse:VARCHAR#, #help:CHAR#, #helpDetails:VARCHAR#, #borrowAmount:DECIMAL#, #guaranteeAmount:DECIMAL#, #enoughDeposits:CHAR#, #howEnough:VARCHAR#, #spouseInformed:CHAR#, #spouseExplanation:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update RL_OTHER_QUESTIONS set BORROWER_SERVICE_APP_ID = #borrowerServiceAppId:DECIMAL#, GUARANTEE = #guarantee:CHAR#, GUARANTEE_DETAILS = #guaranteeDetails:VARCHAR#, HOW_LONG = #howLong:CHAR#, GAMBLING = #gambling:CHAR#, GAMBLING_SPOUSE = #gamblingSpouse:VARCHAR#, HELP = #help:CHAR#, HELP_DETAILS = #helpDetails:VARCHAR#, BORROW_AMOUNT = #borrowAmount:DECIMAL#, GUARANTEE_AMOUNT = #guaranteeAmount:DECIMAL#, ENOUGH_DEPOSITS = #enoughDeposits:CHAR#, HOW_ENOUGH = #howEnough:VARCHAR#, SPOUSE_INFORMED = #spouseInformed:CHAR#, SPOUSE_EXPLANATION = #spouseExplanation:VARCHAR# where OTHER_QUESTIONS_ID = #otherQuestionsId:DECIMAL#

update RL_OTHER_QUESTIONS
BORROWER_SERVICE_APP_ID = #borrowerServiceAppId:DECIMAL#
GUARANTEE = #guarantee:CHAR#
GUARANTEE_DETAILS = #guaranteeDetails:VARCHAR#
HOW_LONG = #howLong:CHAR#
GAMBLING = #gambling:CHAR#
GAMBLING_SPOUSE = #gamblingSpouse:VARCHAR#
HELP = #help:CHAR#
HELP_DETAILS = #helpDetails:VARCHAR#
BORROW_AMOUNT = #borrowAmount:DECIMAL#
GUARANTEE_AMOUNT = #guaranteeAmount:DECIMAL#
ENOUGH_DEPOSITS = #enoughDeposits:CHAR#
HOW_ENOUGH = #howEnough:VARCHAR#
SPOUSE_INFORMED = #spouseInformed:CHAR#
SPOUSE_EXPLANATION = #spouseExplanation:VARCHAR#
where OTHER_QUESTIONS_ID = #otherQuestionsId:DECIMAL#
